attributes.action: Create safe pathways out of Ukraine.
attributes.additional_details: Citizens are stuck in Ukraine with no safe path out. Humanitarian efforts are failing as they don’t have access into or out of the country. The UN must create safe pathways for humanitarian aid to come in, and for citizens to leave.
attributes.background: Start a joint effort with the UN to create safe pathways out of Ukraine through bus and flight connections.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Urge UN to provide safe evacuation routes from war zone in Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610069

Help Ukrainian refugees and create a safe path for them to get to the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609574
